snippet: BINGHAM--Arthur Walker III. The Church Club of New York is deeply saddened by the death of its long-term Life Member and past Church Club President. Our sincere condolences are extended to his wife Nicolette, also a Church Club Life Member, and to the family. Nancy Fisher, President 1/3
lead_paragraph: BINGHAM--Arthur Walker III. The Church Club of New York is deeply saddened by the death of its long-term Life Member and past Church Club President. Our sincere condolences are extended to his wife Nicolette, also a Church Club Life Member, and to the family. Nancy Fisher, President 1/3

headline.main: Paid Notice: Deaths  BINGHAM, ARTHUR WALKER III
